author: Sheena McGinley
title: Gossip | Pics: 22nd Annual ELLE Women in Hollywood Awards - Dunham, Kerr, Hayek, Schumer, Fanning...
text:
Last night, at the Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills, some of the most influential women in Hollywood today turned up to be celebrated by ELLE Magazine at their annual awards.
Lena Dunham, Amy Schumer , Dakota Fanning (Calvin Klein Emerging Star Award), Salma Hayek , Carey Mulligan, Shailene Woodley, Kate Winslet, and Meryl Streep were among those accepting honours on the night.
Trouser suits were prevalent on the night, with Mulligan, Woodley, Sarah Hyland, Emmanuelle Chriqu, Rachel Roy, Mary J Blige, Abigail Spencer, and - most notably - Miranda Kerr all opting for the sleek look.
Actress Darby Stanchfield also brought her variation on the theme via the medium of tights...
Personally, our favourite look of the night was not trouser related. It came from Jenna Dewan Tatum, who can never do wrong in our eyes.
MORE: Photo: Someone just did to Amy Schumer what she did to Kim and Kanye on the red carpet
MORE: Pics: The Inside Soap Awards - red and black were firm favourites
